participant_1.background:
I am close to my family.
My favorite websites are about 80's music and biographies of authors.
i have 3 brothers.
I like to read fiction to escape from the criticism of my family.
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

participant_2.background:
My stamp collection was stolen when my house was broken into.
i ca swim very fast.
i work part time.
I wake up early, meditate, and then have a healthy breakfast before starting my day.
i love to go hiking.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi, how are you today?
Pretty good, thank you! I am excited to start my day. How are you doing?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am getting ready for work.
What do you do for work?
I work part time as a lifeguard. I also swim competitively.
Oh, that is cool! I used to swim when I was younger.
Really? That is awesome! What events did you swim?
I swam the 100m and 200m freestyle.
Oh, nice! I do the 100m butterfly.
That is a tough event! I could never do that.
Yeah, it is pretty challenging. But I love it.
What do you like about swimming?
I love the feeling of the water and the freedom of being able to move around so easily. I also love the competition aspect.
I can understand that. I love the feeling of being in the water. It is so peaceful.
Me too! It is the perfect way to relax and de-stress.
I agree! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to go hiking and camping. I also love to read.
Hiking and camping sound like a lot of fun. I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and mystery novels.
I love historical fiction too! I have not read many mystery novels, but I would like to try some.
There are so many great mystery novels out there. I am sure you would find some that you like.
I will have to look into it. I am always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love to read and I always have a book on my nightstand.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I would love to chat with you again sometime.
I would love that too
